text: Scavenge Ruins||You will be presented with a puzzle to solve; with Fimúl's Eye we will reap its rewards.
Nest||Settle here and though it is a little bright and dry this is something we will soon remedy.
Do Nothing||Leave the settlement as it stands, as any craven cyclops would!

Enshroud||You gain wealth from looting, but buildings in the settlement are damaged. All captives are enslaved, [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} is greatly reduced, and your diplomatic relations with the previous owner also suffer greatly.
Obliterate||All buildings are destroyed and the settlement is torched. A Chaos alter is risen in its place, spewing corruption upon the land, all in Fimúlneid’s name!
Resettle||With no regions, we must settle, Fimúlneid commands it.

Pillage & Enslave||You do not capture the settlement but instead steal wealth and damage buildings. All captives are enslaved, [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} is reduced, and the previous owners will like you a lot less.
